name: BR Style
description:
Race with brazilians cars, drag race and wheelie in roads of Brazil! customize your car or motorcycle as you want and meet new people in multiplayer! It's basically a v2 of "Brasil Tuned Cars Drag Race".

Game content
★ 2 Motorcycles!
★ 14 Cars!
★ Rio de Janeiro map!
★ Brasília map!
★ Multiplayer with drag race against other players!
★ Race agains lots of enemies!
★ Wheelie through speed bumps and between cars!
★ Regular updates always with new features!

BR Style, made by a brazilian for brazilians. or for you if you have good taste.

Join the group on facebook to leave feedback and share photos of your cars with other players: https://www.facebook.com/groups/rachasdetunadosbrasil
